languages.text: "Глядя на то, как вы ведете штурмы миров, лишний раз убеждаешься, что ваше племя недалеко ушло от дубин и камней".
"Observing your kind carry out assaults on worlds proves once again that humans have not advanced much beyond clubs and stones."
languages.original_text: "Глядя на то, как вы ведете штурмы миров, лишний раз убеждаешься, что ваше племя недалеко ушло от дубин и камней".

traits.locale_text: "Observing your kind carry out assaults on worlds proves once again that humans have not advanced much beyond clubs and stones."
"Observing your kind carry out assaults on worlds proves once again that humans have not advanced much beyond clubs and stones."
"Observing your kind carry out assaults on worlds proves once again that humans have not advanced much beyond clubs and stones."
"Observing your kind carry out assaults on worlds proves once again that humans have not advanced much beyond clubs and stones."

languages.text: “我观察了你的种族是如何袭击这个世界的。于是我再次确信，人类的战争除了没有继续用棍棒石头之外，并没有什么太大进步。”
languages.original_text: "Observing your kind carry out assaults on worlds proves once again that humans have not advanced much beyond clubs and stones."

traits.locale_text: “我观察了你的种族是如何袭击这个世界的。于是我再次确信，人类的战争除了没有继续用棍棒石头之外，并没有什么太大进步。”

languages.text: « À voir comment vos semblables prennent des mondes d'assaut, l'on pourrait croire que vous n'avez toujours pas passé le stade des cailloux et des bâtons. »
languages.original_text: "Observing your kind carry out assaults on worlds proves once again that humans have not advanced much beyond clubs and stones."

traits.locale_text: « À voir comment vos semblables prennent des mondes d'assaut, l'on pourrait croire que vous n'avez toujours pas passé le stade des cailloux et des bâtons. »

languages.text: «Observar a vuestra gente asaltar mundos deja claro que los humanos no han avanzado mucho desde los palos y las piedras».
languages.original_text: "Observing your kind carry out assaults on worlds proves once again that humans have not advanced much beyond clubs and stones."

traits.locale_text: «Observar a vuestra gente asaltar mundos deja claro que los humanos no han avanzado mucho desde los palos y las piedras».

languages.text: 「お前のような種族が世界を襲うのを観察していると、人間は棍棒や石ころ以上の進化を遂げていないことが改めて証明されるな」
languages.original_text: "Observing your kind carry out assaults on worlds proves once again that humans have not advanced much beyond clubs and stones."

traits.locale_text: 「お前のような種族が世界を襲うのを観察していると、人間は棍棒や石ころ以上の進化を遂げていないことが改めて証明されるな」

languages.text: "Wenn man sieht, wie Euresgleichen Welten angreift, beweist das nur erneut: Die Menschen haben sich noch nicht über Keulen und Steine hinausentwickelt."
languages.original_text: "Observing your kind carry out assaults on worlds proves once again that humans have not advanced much beyond clubs and stones."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn man sieht, wie Euresgleichen Welten angreift, beweist das nur erneut: Die Menschen haben sich noch nicht über Keulen und Steine hinausentwickelt."

languages.original_text: "Observing your kind carry out assaults on worlds proves once again that humans have not advanced much beyond clubs and stones."

languages.text: "Türünün dünyalarda gerçekleştirdiği saldırıları inceledim, insanların taş ve sopa döneminden beri pek gelişmediğini bir kez daha kanıtlıyorlar."
languages.original_text: "Observing your kind carry out assaults on worlds proves once again that humans have not advanced much beyond clubs and stones."

traits.locale_text: "Türünün dünyalarda gerçekleştirdiği saldırıları inceledim, insanların taş ve sopa döneminden beri pek gelişmediğini bir kez daha kanıtlıyorlar."
